com.bigdata.quorum

Interface QuorumStateChangeEvent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QCE

    public interface QuorumStateChangeEvent
    Event data equivalent to the QuorumStateChangeListener API. This interface makes it possible to enqueue these messages and then process them asynchronously.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    QuorumStateChangeListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UUID[] getDownstreamOldAndNew()
      Return the old and new downstream UUIDs.
      QuorumStateChangeEventEnum getEventType()
      The type of event and never null.
      long getLastCommitTimeConsensus()
      The last commit time consensus.
      UUID getLeaderId()
      Return the UUID of the quorum leader.
      long getToken()
      Return the token on which the quorum met.

    • Method Detail

      • getEventType

        QuorumStateChangeEventEnum getEventType()
        The type of event and never null.

      • getDownstreamOldAndNew

        UUID[] getDownstreamOldAndNew()
        Return the old and new downstream UUIDs.
        Returns:
        An array of two elements. [0] is the old downstream service UUID. [1] is the new downstream service UUID.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - unless getEventType() is QuorumStateChangeEventEnum.PIPELINE_CHANGE.
        See Also:
        QuorumStateChangeListener.pipelineChange(UUID, UUID)

      • getLastCommitTimeConsensus

        long getLastCommitTimeConsensus()
        The last commit time consensus.
        Returns:
        The last commit time consensus value.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - unless getEventType() is QuorumStateChangeEventEnum.CONSENSUS.
        See Also:
        QuorumStateChangeListener.consensus(long)

      • getToken

        long getToken()
        Return the token on which the quorum met.
        Returns:
        The token.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - unless getEventType() is QuorumStateChangeEventEnum.QUORUM_MEET.
        See Also:
        QuorumStateChangeListener.quorumMeet(long, UUID)

      • getLeaderId

        UUID getLeaderId()
        Return the UUID of the quorum leader.
        Returns:
        The UUID of the quorum leader.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - unless getEventType() is QuorumStateChangeEventEnum.QUORUM_MEET.
        See Also:
        QuorumStateChangeListener.quorumMeet(long, UUID)
